trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A mód, amely kezeli a **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** az esemény egy <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: A AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler delegált van definiálva a következő <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>osztály</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> az esemény</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Érheti el a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>az esemény a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>nevű eljárást megadásával osztály **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** az ASP.NET-alkalmazás a Global.asax fájlban.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs an <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>hoz létre egy <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>az aktuális objektum <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, és továbbadja azt a **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** esemény.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: Használhatja a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>átadott objektum a **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** értékre való beállítására a névtelen azonosító egy egyéni esemény.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: Ha nem ad meg értéket a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>tulajdonság során a **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** esemény, a <xref:System.Guid>szolgál.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A> by setting the configuration element to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** esemény csak akkor jelenik meg, ha névtelen azonosítás <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>úgy, hogy a konfigurációs elem `true`.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>
